argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tsmsval.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | tsmsval.j | |- J = ( TopOpen ` G ) |
| 3 |  | tsmsval.s | |- S = ( ~P A i^i Fin ) |
| 4 |  | tsmsval.l | |- L = ran ( z e. S |-> { y e. S | z C_ y } ) |
| 5 |  | tsmsval.g | |- ( ph -> G e. V ) |
| 6 |  | tsmsval.a | |- ( ph -> A e. W ) |
| 7 |  | tsmsval.f | |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` G ) e. _V |
| 9 | 1, 8 | #P_eqeltri | |- B e. _V |
| 10 | 9 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> B e. _V ) |
| 11 |  | #P_fex2 | |- ( ( F : A --> B /\ A e. W /\ B e. _V ) -> F e. _V ) |
| 12 | 7, 6, 10, 11 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ph -> F e. _V ) |
| 13 |  | #P_fdm | |- ( F : A --> B -> dom F = A ) |
| 14 | 7, 13 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> dom F = A ) |
| 15 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 12, 14 | #P_tsmsval2 | |- ( ph -> ( G tsums F ) = ( ( J fLimf ( S filGen L ) ) ` ( y e. S |-> ( G gsum ( F |` y ) ) ) ) ) |
